summary: Represents the first routine antenatal care visit (ANC1) for pregnant women, delivering scheduled interventions, providing early‑pregnancy services even if the visit occurs later, arranging the subsequent ANC appointment, and triggering admission to an antenatal inpatient ward when complications arise.
business_intent: Ensure timely delivery of essential first‑trimester prenatal services, coordinate follow‑up care, and manage complications to improve maternal and fetal health outcomes.
